page.title: 18COMMUNITY COUNCIL ACTIVITIES
page.content: HARVEST SUPPER After harvest time there was a Harvest Supper in the village hall. For food there were salads and jacket potatoes and bread rolls on a long table. It was a buffet supper. When all the food had gone the tables were cleared and put away then the people could get up and dance. After we had danced we had a magician and a dancer who came out of a pretend house on the stage. MINI-MARATHON In 1985 somebody had the idea of doing a mini-marathon to raise money for the Community Council and so, sponsored by the Mendlesham Bakery, it was held on Sunday 19th May. Everybody lined up at the start on the playing field and when the man fired the gun they started the race. There were 172 sponsored runners.
